name: Mausoleum of the Medusa
description: 'Medusa' is a love song to brutal, old-school arena combat. Perseus and Medusa are trapped in a deathmatch--but the gods raise them from the dead! Prove yourself with first blood, then compete for the top spot on the Steam leaderboard!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX 9.0/OpenGL 2 compliant DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very enjoyable and it is free so there isn't a reason not to play it.
I regret the litte amount of time spent on this boring game.
Great, fun game, evil AF.  Can't wait for what else this studio does!
